items.text: very full again. He's giving it some air, but it's easy pickings if it's so full. Flicked off his toes to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Chase to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: better length that time, drawing the batsman forward to defend outside off
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: drags this down short, and Tamim stands tall in his crease to punch this past cover
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: good length all on off, not much turn though. Tamim pushes it towards cover
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Amzad: "After Mashrafi's retirement BD new a Pacer like him who can Bolwing like a leader and also have ability to score some run with the bat.Saifuddin is the answer I guess, management should give him some chance."
items.text: good length on off, defended to third man with an open face
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: stopped on the pitch a bit that one, he was coming forward to turn it to the leg side, but ends up popping it in front of him off a leading edge. The ball didn't travel much so never any danger of the bowler being within catching distance
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length on off again, steered to  short third man again
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, he comes on the front foot to drive, but straight to extra cover
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: too short and width given outside off, spoils what has been a good over so far. Mushfiqur is quick to capitalise and slashes it high over point. Bounces in front of the ropes
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: tries to compensate by going too straight, and is turned away to deep square leg
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: hashanat: "I believe Abu Haider Rony is also there as a good medium pace all-rounder with Saifuddin@Amzad "
items.text: tossed up, drifting down leg. Bad ball and he takes full toll, going down to sweep it fine
items.shortText: Chase to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: slog-swept to midwicket. Tossed up on off, he spotted it immediately and the ball was full enough to go for it. He gave it a good old wallop, one bounce into the fence
items.shortText: Chase to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: now he goes for the lap shot. Get the ball over the keeper's head and already this is an expensive over, just halfway through
items.shortText: Chase to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: tossed up, and wanted to whip it away but gets a leading edge that trickles back to the bowler
items.shortText: Chase to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: stays back and low that time to his length ball outside off and late cuts it fine enough to pick up two
items.shortText: Chase to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length on off again, and he stays back and opens the face of the bat to run it down to third man
items.shortText: Chase to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Bangladesh have lifted their run-rate to six now and these two are looking ominous
items.text: back of a length, but angling too much into the batsman, ends up on his pads. He's unable to connect with the flick off his hips though
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length on leg stump, tapped to short midwicket
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back of a length on the stumps, short enough for him to stay back and flick it to fine leg. Ball was in the air for a while but safe because there's no short fine leg
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: good length on off, steered to point
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: good length outside off, dabs it down to third man
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: slightly fuller on the stumps, he comes forward to squirt this to third man. And it's time for drinks
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText:
Chase has been hit out of the attack. Here's Bishoo Mohammad Isam, our Bangladesh correspondent who's on the spot, has this update on Liton Das: "The x-ray shows no fracture. If he can manage the pain, he will bat, according to Bangladesh manager Sabbir Khan".

Jimit: "Just read the article about Bangladesh's quintet. I am surprised that since Azharuddin retired, India haven't had a quintet who has played 100 matches together, even though Sachin, Saurav, Dravid, Zaheer and Kumble were together for many matches." - For those wondering which article, do take a read here.
items.text: well tossed up, very full, driven to long-on
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: good length, tossed up on leg and middle, he comes forward and drives to cover
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: tossed up on middle, he goes deep in his crease to play it to square leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run
